metas.name: Wild Kratts
metas.description: Combines animation and live-action to teach kids about animals and biology, similar to the educational aspects of Magic School Bus and Ada Twist.

metas.name: Sid the Science Kid
metas.description: An animated preschool show that explores scientific concepts through a curious child's perspective, echoing Ada Twist's curiosity.

metas.name: Super Why!
metas.description: Uses literacy and reading to solve problems, appealing to kids who enjoy problem-solving and educational content like Peg + Cat.

metas.name: Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood
metas.description: A gentle, animated show focusing on social-emotional learning and everyday life lessons for preschoolers, similar to the heartwarming nature of Bluey and Doc McStuffins.

metas.name: Octonauts
metas.description: Animated series about underwater exploration and conservation, offering educational adventure with a focus on marine biology.

metas.name: Little Einsteins
metas.description: Combines classical music, art, and adventure to educate preschoolers, aligning with the educational and exploratory spirit of shows like Magic School Bus and Curious George.

metas.name: Tumble Leaf
metas.description: A visually stunning stop-motion animated series that encourages exploration, discovery, and problem-solving for young children.

metas.name: Ask the StoryBots
metas.description: A fun and informative animated series that answers kids' questions about the world in a musical and engaging way.

metas.name: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That!
metas.description: Features the iconic Cat in the Hat teaching young viewers about science and nature through whimsical adventures.

metas.name: Puffin Rock
metas.description: A peaceful animated series about two young puffins exploring their island home and learning about nature, offering a calming and educational experience.

metas.name: Splash and Bubbles
metas.description: An animated show that follows a yellow tang and his friends as they explore different marine environments and learn about ocean life.

metas.name: Ready Jet Go!
metas.description: Focuses on space exploration and astronomy for preschoolers, similar to the science-based learning in Ada Twist and Magic School Bus.

metas.name: Molly of Denali
metas.description: An animated series that follows a young girl in Alaska who uses her knowledge and technology to help her community and learn about Inuit culture.

metas.name: Xavier Riddle and the Secret Museum
metas.description: Combines history and adventure as Xavier travels back in time to meet famous historical figures, educational and engaging.

metas.name: Dino Dana
metas.description: A live-action series where a young girl studies and interacts with realistic CGI dinosaurs, blending education and fantasy.

metas.name: Odd Squad
metas.description: A live-action show where kids solve math and science problems to save the day, offering humor and problem-solving like WordGirl.

metas.name: The Loud House
metas.description: A family-friendly animated sitcom about a boy with ten sisters, focusing on sibling relationships and everyday life with humor.

metas.name: Amphibia
metas.description: An animated adventure series about a girl who travels to a magical world, blending fantasy with themes of friendship and courage.

metas.name: Sofia the First
metas.description: A Disney animated series about a young girl who becomes a princess, focusing on kindness, empathy, and learning to navigate new social situations.

metas.name: Elena of Avalor
metas.description: An animated musical series about a brave princess who rules her kingdom with courage and compassion.

metas.name: Mickey Mouse Mixed-Up Adventures
metas.description: A fun and engaging animated series where Mickey and his friends go on adventures to solve problems, similar to Special Agent Oso's mission-based format.

metas.name: Puppy Dog Pals
metas.description: An animated comedy about two puppy brothers who go on adventures around their neighborhood and the world, with a focus on teamwork and problem-solving.

metas.name: Mira, Royal Detective
metas.description: An animated mystery series set in magical India, where a young detective solves cases for the royal family, blending culture and problem-solving.

metas.name: The Boss Baby: Back in Business
metas.description: A humorous animated series that follows a baby in a suit who is secretly a corporate executive, offering lighthearted comedy for families.

metas.name: Hilda
metas.description: An animated fantasy series about a brave young girl who moves from the wilderness to the city and befriends magical creatures, with stunning animation and imaginative stories.

metas.name: The Owl House
metas.description: An animated fantasy-comedy series about a human girl who stumbles upon a portal to a magical world and befriends witches, focusing on friendship and self-discovery.

metas.name: Kipo and the Age of Wonderbeasts
metas.description: A vibrant animated series set in a post-apocalyptic world where humans and intelligent animals coexist, focusing on themes of friendship, acceptance, and adventure.

metas.name: Esme & Roy
metas.description: An animated series about two monster

metas.name: Alma's Way
metas.description: An animated show that follows a young Puerto Rican girl who learns about her culture and community through problem-solving and family traditions.

metas.name: Trash Truck
metas.description: A gentle and charming animated series about the friendship between a boy and his unique friend, a trash truck, exploring themes of companionship and imagination.

metas.name: Harvey Street Kids
metas.description: An animated series about a group of girls who rule their street and go on imaginative adventures, capturing the spirit of childhood play.

metas.name: The Ghost and Molly McGee
metas.description: A musical animated comedy about a cheerful girl who befriends a ghost, exploring themes of finding the positive in challenging situations.

metas.name: The Weekenders
metas.description: An animated series about four best friends and their weekend adventures, capturing the essence of childhood friendships and relatable scenarios.

metas.name: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show
metas.description: An animated musical comedy where Mr. Peabody and Sherman host a talk show from their historical house, featuring educational segments and humor.

metas.name: Green Eggs and Ham
metas.description: A beautifully animated series based on Dr. Seuss's book, offering whimsical stories, catchy songs, and themes of trying new things.
